name: Torvac
description:
One vacuum, endless vacuuming responsibilities. TORVAC (portmanteau of "Tornado" and "Vacuum") is an endless game where you vacuum bits and pieces that fly your way, one by one. Be careful of the red papers as you aim to get the best score possible!

This game can also be played with a PS4 controller.
PS4 controls:
Left joystick: Move vacuum
X button (On settings): Start game
